content.raw:
Since this is a virtual function, I think it needs to go the end. I just tested the ABI with it moved up and it fails:

"The layout of v-table has been changed. Call of any virtual method at higher position in this class or its subclasses may result in crash or incorrect behavior of applications."

EDIT: @hsu I think it needs to be down at the bottom.
